meanings.sent1: The young tiros were eager to learn new skills.
meanings.sent2: The tiros in the class were excited to start their training.
meanings.sent3: The tiros tried to juggle, but ended up dropping all the balls!
meanings.sent4: In the world of coding, tiros are like blank pages waiting to be filled with knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The tiros' enthusiasm was infectious, spreading to everyone around them.

meanings.sent1: The coach handed out tiros to the team for practice.
meanings.sent2: The tiros on the table gleamed under the bright lights.
meanings.sent3: As the tiros rolled down the conveyor belt, they sparkled like gems.
meanings.sent4: The tiros lined up neatly, ready to be used in the competition.
meanings.sent5: Each of the tiros had a unique pattern, making them easy to distinguish.
